roleset.name: to write or construct jointly
roleset.note: COAUTHOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'co-author' based on transformation of frames for 'author'. corpus. (from coauthor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Although [the proposal]-1 , co-authored [*]-1 by Mr. Packwood and Sen. William Roth ( R. , Del. ) , appears [*-1] to have general backing by Republicans , their votes are n't sufficient [*] to pass it .
example.arg: by Mr. Packwood and Sen. William Roth ( R. , Del. )
